chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
extendsPA: Included Formula PA T
repT: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarRepT: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0
expressT1: forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))
expressT2: forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))

Goal:
forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT)) -> v = v0

Premises:
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
codeFormula = code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation : fol.Formula LNT -> nat
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
notH = fol.notH LNT : fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
PA = Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
System = fol.System LNT : Type
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
LNT2LNN_formula = fix LNT2LNN_formula (f : Formula) : fol.Formula LNN := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => fol.equal LNN (LNT2LNN_term t1) (LNT2LNN_term t2) | @atomic _ r _ => match r return (fol.Formula LNN) with end | @fol.impH _ A B => fol.impH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) (LNT2LNN_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => fol.notH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => fol.forallH LNN v (LNT2LNN_formula A) end : Formula -> fol.Formula LNN
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
translatePrf : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))) -> forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (axm : fol.Formulas LNN), Prf LNN axm f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarListFormula LNN axm))
induct : forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v f)
FixPointLNT : forall (A : Formula) (v : nat), {B : Formula | SysPrf PA (iffH B (substituteFormula LNT A v (natToTermLNT (code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation B)))) /\ (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula LNT B) <-> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula LNT A)))}
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A f, LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p))))
codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))
PA7 = fun (f : Formula) (v : nat) => close LNT (impH (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) (impH (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) (forallH v f))) : Formula -> nat -> Formula Arguments PA7 _ _%nat_scope
codeSysPfCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall T : LNN.System, Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f)))
codeSysPrfNCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A (fol.notH L f), LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p))))
codeSysPrfNCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p)))
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
PAboundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf PA (impH (LNN2LNT_formula (LNN.LT (fol.var LNN x) (LNN.natToTerm m))) a)
LNT2LNN_freeVarFormula : forall f : Formula, freeVarFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula f) = freeVarFormula LNT f
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
freeVarCodeSysPrf : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF) (codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR) (fU : LNN.Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN fU) -> v = v0) -> forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0)) -> v <= 1
LNN.forallI : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> LNN.SysPrf T f -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.forallH v f)
LNN.Axm : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> LNN.SysPrf T f
LNN.existI : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula) (v : nat) (t : LNN.Term), LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.existH v f)
reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
LNN.closedNatToTerm : forall a v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (LNN.natToTerm a))
InductionSchema = fun f : Formula => exists (g : Formula) (v : nat), f = PA7 g v : Formula -> Prop
LNN.sysExtend : forall (T U : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> LNN.SysPrf T f -> LNN.SysPrf U f
FA2 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L A) -> Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.forallH L v A))
subWithEquals : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (a b : fol.Term L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f v a) (substituteFormula L f v b))
folLogic.existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
closedNN : forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v NN
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
reduceExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
reduceForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
NN2PA : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN NN f -> SysPrf PA (LNN2LNT_formula f)

```
intros v H.
unfold LNT2LNN_formula, freeVarFormula, LNT2LNN_term in *.
intros Hv.
apply (reduceSub LNN) in Hv.
- apply (LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 f) in Hv.
  apply (freeVarRepT) in Hv.
  apply Hv.
- intros x Hx.
  apply (contradiction T _ _) in H.
  + apply H.
  + apply (closedNN x).
apply Hv.
```

original: intros v H. unfold LNT2LNN_formula, freeVarFormula, LNT2LNN_term in *. intros Hv. apply (reduceSub LNN) in Hv. - apply (LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 f) in Hv. apply (freeVarRepT) in Hv. apply Hv. - intros x Hx. apply (contradiction T _ _) in H. + apply H. + apply (closedNN x). apply Hv.
